name: St. Vincent de Paul Society (San Mateo County)
description: Accepts donations of clothing, furniture, housewares, and appliances; operates thrift stores with proceeds supporting homeless and low-income assistance programs; pickup available for large items
fullDescription: St. Vincent de Paul Society operates thrift stores and accepts donations throughout San Mateo County, with proceeds supporting homeless services and low-income assistance programs.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing and furniture
- Accept housewares and appliances
- Pickup available for large items
- Multiple thrift store locations
- Affordable shopping
- Proceeds support homeless services
howToGetIt:
1. Find nearest SVdP location
2. Donate gently used items
3. Schedule pickup for large items
4. Or shop at thrift stores
5. Support homeless assistance
6. Get donation receipt
keywords: St. Vincent de Paul, SVdP, San Mateo, thrift store, donate clothes, donate furniture, donate appliances, pickup, homeless services, charity shop
